suncertify.network
Class ServerStarter

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.network.ServerStarter

public class ServerStarter
extends java.lang.Object

The objects from this class start the server which accepts network connections via RMI.

Version:
1.4
Author:
Pedro Oliveira
See Also:
ConfigOptions, JLabel, GuiException

Constructor Summary
ServerStarter(ConfigOptions options)
          Creates an instance of the ServerStarter class using the configuration options specified as input parameter.
 
Method Summary
 void start(javax.swing.JLabel statusLabel)
          This method starts the server that accepts RMI connections and updates the statusLabel during its process.

Constructor Detail

ServerStarter

public ServerStarter(ConfigOptions options)
Creates an instance of the ServerStarter class using the configuration options specified as input parameter.

Parameters:

Method Detail

start

public void start(javax.swing.JLabel statusLabel)
           throws GuiException
This method starts the server that accepts RMI connections and updates the statusLabel during its process.

Parameters:
statusLabel - this reference is changed during the method execution to give feedback to user about the server status.
Throws:
GuiException - thrown if any exception was raised trying to start the server.
